alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 11:10PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gosper and northern Furnas Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1110 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Holbrook, or 28 miles southeast of Curtis, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Holbrook around 1130 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Arapahoe, Beaver City and Edison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
